snippet: The deal is expected to expand Concordia’s geographic footprint to more than 100 countries and give it access to 190 pharmaceutical products.
abstract: Concordia Healthcare Corporation agrees to buy drug maker Amdipharm Mercury from European private equity firm Cinven.
lead_paragraph: The deal is expected to expand Concordia’s geographic footprint to more than 100 countries and give it access to 190 pharmaceutical products.

headline.main: Concordia Healthcare to Acquire Drug Maker Amdipharm Mercury
